titleStmt.title: The Conduct and character of Count Nicholas Serini, Protestant Generalissimo of the auxiliaries in Hungary ... with his parallels Scanderbeg & Tamberlain : interwoven with the principal passages of the Christians and Turks discipline and success, since the infidels first invasion of Europe, in the year 1313.
titleStmt.author: O. C.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
